Our Sermons

Missed a service? Catch up by listening online!

Listen Online

We hope you take every opportunity use our online sermons as a resource throughout your day, week, and more. We truly believe that words have power and that our body of Christ is strong in these words. Listen and be impowered by the words of our community.

Sermon Cycle

To keep connection speedy and more convenient for you, we will move sermons to soundcloud every 3 months. You will be able to view all of the sermons on soundcloud.

Soundcloud
